text: OCE board & staff perform all official duties in a nonpartisan matter #OCEFacts

After a 2nd phase review
column4: OCE board recommends further review or dismissal by House Ethics Committee #OCEFacts

text: 3 OCE board members authorize a 2nd phase review. It lasts 45 days with a possible 14-day extension #OCEFacts
If the OCE thinks there's "probable cause" a violation occurred
column4: it may start a 2nd phase review. #OCEFacts

text: It takes two board members to launch a preliminary review
column4: a process that lasts up to 30 days #OCEFacts

text: OCE board starts a preliminary review when there is a "reasonable basis to believe" an #ethics violation occurred. #OCEFacts
OCE investigations have 2 stages: preliminary & 2nd phase review. #OCEFacts

column4: OCE cases sent to House Ethics Committee for further review must become public #OCEFacts

column4: OCE refers its investigations to the House #Ethics Committee for further review #OCEFacts

text: Facts not sanctions. OCE is a fact-finding office & doesn't make final conclusions about whether or not a rule violation occurred #OCEFacts
